mapper.insert: insert into sss_manger (mg_id, role_id, manger_name, manger_psd, manger_gen, tel, address, comment) values (#{mgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mangerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mangerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mangerGen,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sss_manger set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manger_name = #{mangerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manger_psd = #{mangerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manger_gen = #{mangerGen,jdbcType=CHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mg_id = #{mgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select mg_id, role_id, manger_name, manger_psd, manger_gen, tel, address, comment from sss_manger
